trancheData.trancheADAI: Tranche A - Compound DAI is the senior tranche of the CDAI token. This tranche yields a fixed rate of 3.99%, in addition to SLICE rewards as shown in Net APY.
trancheData.isTheSenior: is the senior tranche of the
trancheData.thisTrancheFixed: This tranche yields a fixed rate of
trancheData.inAddition: in addition to SLICE rewards as shown in Net APY.
trancheData.isTheJunior: is the junior tranche of the
trancheData.thisTrancheVariable: This tranche yields a variable rate of
trancheData.trancheBDAI: Tranche B - Compound DAI is the junior tranche of the CDAI token. This tranche yields a variable rate of -5.83%, in addition to SLICE rewards as shown in Net APY.
trancheData.trancheAUSDT: Tranche A - Compound USDT is the senior tranche of the CUSDT token. This tranche yields a fixed rate of 1.99%, in addition to SLICE rewards as shown in Net APY.
trancheData.trancheBUSDT: Tranche B - Compound USDT is the junior tranche of the CUSDT token. This tranche yields a variable rate of -1.35%, in addition to SLICE rewards as shown in Net APY.

stakeLive.title: SLICE staking is live!
stakeLive.details: Stake your SLICE or SLICE LP tokens to earn rewards

modal.DontHaveSlice: You don’t have any SLICE available to stake. Click the button below to purchase SLICE Tokens
modal.DontHaveSliceLP: You don’t have any SLICE-LP available to stake. Click the button below to go to UniSwap and get SLICE-LP Tokens

table.stakingPool: Each pool has a different base currency that you can deposit into.
table.totalStaked: The amount staked in each pool.
table.reward: The reward amount per epoch duration, which is currently one week.
table.apy: The annualized return of return on your staked assets.
table.manageStake: Deposit or withdraw your staked assets.
table.platform: Instruments represent different assets derived from yield generating assets from major protocols, press on the instrument to learn more.
table.netApy: The expected yearly return on investment by adding the yield from the Tranche instrument in addition to SLICE rewards.
table.totalDeposits: Total deposits accross all users into each specific Tranche.
table.myDeposits: Your holdings in the USD value at any given point, including accrued interest.
table.available: Your holdings of the currency that you may deposit into this Tranche.
table.totalAmount: The total amount of staked or deposited assets in USD on the Tranche Protocol.
